title: Coding for Communicators
description: This foundational unit provides a hands-on approach to the field of computational communication. It is intended to help communication professionals to develop and apply programming skills to work with data, for future careers in human resource management, policy strategy, public relations, data-focused journalism, and scientific communication. Students will learn how to apply computational thinking for problem solving, and develop foundation skills in languages like R or Python for the purpose of collecting, processing, and reporting data about people.
